quotes.quote: There are things that you can only learn by facing the unknown, be it a different species, different values, or upbringing.
In all things, I think having a dream requires having the resolve to struggle with reality.

Remember how you're supposed to let go right away when you fall off a horse and hit the ground? You don't need to hurt yourself for no reason. If you don't let go, you'll get dragged by the horse and get hurt.
